_comment_mode_architecture: All agents support TWO modes: (1) guidance (FREE - returns prompt for Claude Code to execute), (2) external-llm (COSTS MONEY - calls LLM(s) configured in 'models' list). If multiple models listed, ALL run in parallel for adversarial redundancy. Use --model flag to override and run specific model only. Default mode is 'guidance' to minimize costs.

fact_verify_agent._comment: fact_verify agent ONLY operates in guidance mode - external LLMs cannot access file system to check evidence

organize_agent._comment: organize agent ONLY operates in guidance mode - NEVER uses external APIs
